content: tic-tac-toe egg game written and designed by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2024 in 2020 i crocheted a bunch of easter eggs and decided to make a tic-tac-toe game with them i like neat and tidy so i turned the playing field into a little pouch because i like fun stuff i added eggs to the ends of the cord too i used all sorts of cotton and acrylic yarn at the time yarn that i had found at the local thrift store i posted a cute photo on instagram after which the game ended up at the bottom of a crate in 2023 simply crochet magazine asked me if they could feature that photo in their magazine i dug up the game and was shocked by the yarn that i had used after taking a good long look at it i crocheted it all over again with better material by the time i had written the pattern easter 2023 had passed already and that is why i delayed the release of the pattern to this year skill level easy terminology us terms yardage 204 meters/ 223 yards finished size 15 x 15 cm when crocheted on hook size 3 mm no swatch needed materials hobbii rainbow 8/4 cotton 50 g/170 m 25 g of dusty light green-075 35 g of rose-044 pink label mixed up 50 g/150 m 15 g of daisy-bright white-056 3 mm crochet hook a stitch marker a pair of scissors a darning needle some stuffing material © tic-tac-toe egg game by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2024 1 any yarn will do for this project use a hook size that is recommended for the chosen yarn using a different yarn and/or hook size will only affect the size of the game i used the same hook size for the eggs and the pouch you might want to use a smaller hook
